attributes.action: Abolish the charitable status of fee-paying private schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Fee-paying private schools are not charities, and should not be able to gain the benefits, particularly in respect of certain tax exemptions, that genuine charities can. Therefore, fee-paying private education should not be considered to be a charitable activity within charity law.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
